generated_description: after school day service baba barun fukuyama ekaya is a company based in fukuyama, hiroshima prefecture. it operates a variety of services including after-school day services, private after-school clubs, cultural schools, rental rooms, and public after-school club support programs. the company focuses on providing children with diverse experiences and opportunities to develop their confidence and self-motivation. their programs encompass activities such as art therapy, dance therapy, bouldering, and sensory integration. the company aims to support parents in raising their children and fostering a sense of community and safety for children and families.
